name: CatAsteroid
description:
Platformer Puzzle game, where the player plays as a Cat Astonaut and needs to rescue his prcious wife, the Bongo cat.

Controls.

Movement -> WASD

Jump -> Space

Select meteroid -> left mouse button

move selected meteroid vertically -> shift + scroll Up / Down

move selected meteroid north/ South -> CTRL + Scroll Up/Down 

move selected meteroid horizontally -> Scroll UP / Down
